title: Phosphorus
desc:
Post 853
*I wanted to make this orange because of a mobile game i played, luckily i came up with a much better idea.*
- Can also be played when someone makes any sort of comment made towards you in a negitive way, even if its not your turn.
- You throw White Phosphorus at your target. Catching them on fire, and then catching them on fire again when they put it out.
- While on fire, your target cannot discard cards. Fire lasts for 2 turns.
- For the rest of the game, when your target plays a <:red:1106234051129507932>, they catch fire again.
